overview:
Before joining PayByGroup, Dan was a program manager at the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA), the organization that created the Internet, where he managed over $200M in research projects. His most well-known project at DARPA was Watson, the super-computer that competed on Jeopardy! Prior to that, he was a researcher at IBM Research where he worked on and led multiple data-mining projects in text, email, and adaptive interfaces.

Dan holds a black belt in group organizing and enjoys working in coffee shops.

Dan has a Ph.D. in computer science with a focus on artificial intelligence and machine learning from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. Prior to that, Dan received a MS in computer science from Ohio State University. Dan also holds undergraduate degrees in computer science and mathematics.
